summary: In 1897 Swedish engineer S. A. Andrée with 2 colleagues prepares to fly over the North Pole in his balloon "Eagle".
cast: Max von Sydow|Sverre Anker Ousdal|Göran Stangertz|Eva von Hanno|Charlotta Larsson|Clément Harari|Cornelis Vreeswijk|Jan-Olof Strandberg|Henric Holmberg|Mimi Pollak|Siv Ericks|Ulla Sjöblom|Knut Husebø|Peter Schildt|Ingvar Kjellson|Lasse Pöysti|Bruno Balp|Åke Whilney|Berto Marklund|Staffan Liljander|Henrik Schildt|Mårten Larsson|Angelica Lundqvist|Allan Schulman|Bruno Sörwing|Anders Wallgren|Barbro Samuelsson|P.O. title: El vuelo del águila
